short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor and filter out inappropriate websites and search results on your child's Chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Safety and Security with Trio, now as a Chrome Extension  

Trio is specifically designed for families. It is meant to be a tool to manage, supervise, monitor, and control online activity to prevent digital cyber threats. This application comes with a wide range of features and possibilities. It is trying to fit every need of a family in; from screen time habits to detailed reports of children’s activity. Trio is a prominent parental control app safeguarding families, and it’s now available as an extension for Chromebook. 

trio come in two apps. One for parents, one for Kids. Parents can install their app to start monitoring their kids, using a variety of features and possibilities. These features include:  

Smart App Rules; to monitor app usage 

Location Services, to locate children ensuring their safety 

App Monitoring, to monitor social interactions 

Safe Search, to prevent inappropriate keywords search 

Web Filter, to stop unhealthy web search result 

Smart Screen, to manage Screentime  

With all these arms added to the family, Trio ensures safety and security, to help families maintain a healthy lifestyle.
